attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Common sense. Criminals are exposing the system using the "Human Rights Act." Criminals not being able to be deported as it would be "against their human rights."
Terrorists are getting lesser sentences due to the Human Rights Act whereas the victims' Human Rights count for nothing.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " SCRAP the Human Right's Act!!!."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16577


Prime Minister's Office
